languages.text: {n}Чем дольше вы смотрите на мужчину, тем больше отклонений от человеческого облика замечаете. Такие убогие, изуродованные генетическими отклонениями и болезнями — идеальный котел для истинной скверны.{/n}

{n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чем дольше вы смотрите на мужчину, тем больше отклонений от человеческого облика замечаете. Такие убогие, изуродованные генетическими отклонениями и болезнями — идеальный котел для истинной скверны.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuanto más miras al hombre, más aberraciones de la fisionomía humana detectas en él. Los despojos como él, desfigurados por enfermedades y anomalías genéticas, son un caldo de cultivo ideal para la verdadera corrupción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuanto más miras al hombre, más aberraciones de la fisionomía humana detectas en él. Los despojos como él, desfigurados por enfermedades y anomalías genéticas, son un caldo de cultivo ideal para la verdadera corrupción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}見つめるほどに、人間の姿から逸脱していることがわかる。遺伝子異常や病気によって醜くなったこのような惨めな男は、真の腐敗を生み出す絶好の温床なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}見つめるほどに、人間の姿から逸脱していることがわかる。遺伝子異常や病気によって醜くなったこのような惨めな男は、真の腐敗を生み出す絶好の温床なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你越是盯着这个人看，越是注意到这个人根本不像正常的人类。由于疾病与基因变异，这些怪物的身体已经扭曲得不成人样。他们是最适合孕育腐化的温床。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你越是盯着这个人看，越是注意到这个人根本不像正常的人类。由于疾病与基因变异，这些怪物的身体已经扭曲得不成人样。他们是最适合孕育腐化的温床。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je länger du den Mann betrachtest, desto mehr Abweichungen von seiner menschlichen Gestalt entdeckst du. Von genetischen Abnormitäten und Krankheiten entstellte Leute wie er bilden einen perfekten Nährboden für wahre Verderbnis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je länger du den Mann betrachtest, desto mehr Abweichungen von seiner menschlichen Gestalt entdeckst du. Von genetischen Abnormitäten und Krankheiten entstellte Leute wie er bilden einen perfekten Nährboden für wahre Verderbnis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plus vous dévisagez cet homme, plus ses difformités vous sautent aux yeux. Défigurés par les anomalies génétiques et la maladie, ces damnés sont le terreau idéal pour la corruption sous sa forme la plus pure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plus vous dévisagez cet homme, plus ses difformités vous sautent aux yeux. Défigurés par les anomalies génétiques et la maladie, ces damnés sont le terreau idéal pour la corruption sous sa forme la plus pure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adama bakmaya devam ettikçe insan formundan ne kadar saptığını fark ediyorsun. Genetik anormalliklerle ve hastalıklarla biçimsizleşen bunun gibi sefiller, hakiki yozlaşma için mükemmel bir üreme yuvasıdır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you stare at the man, the more deviations from the human form you detect. Wretches such as this, disfigured by genetic abnormalities and disease, are the perfect breeding ground for true corruption.{/n}
